content: The obj variable contains the object reference pointing to an object created from the MyObject class. The obj object reference is in scope inside the { }.  After the } the object becomes garbage.  Object references can be passed in to methods and can be returned from methods.
stemmed: the obj variabl contain object refer point object creat myobject class . the obj object refer scope insid { } . after } object becom garbag . object refer pass method return method .
